verbs.description: It [V: has] been said that Trump gets all his inspiration , ideas , policies , directives , etc . from watching TV , and that the last thing he saw or heard is what he will act upon . I believe he should be forced to watch Sophie ’s Choice with Meryl Streep . This ...
